about_the_game:
Add 129 Sutorīto Wōkā Nekomimi to Hentai Senpai: Sukebe Nekomimi no Yoru!

Thats 129 new swapping/rotating puzzles with increasing difficulty to solve.
Be rewarded with an up close view of all 129 Nekomimi in the gallery!

Add these new spicy Nekomimi to your collection now with Sutorīto Wōkā!

content_descriptors.notes: Hentai Senpai: Sukebe Nekomimi no Yoru - Sutorīto Wōkā has graphic sexual content including nudity, sex, genitalia, bondage, sex toys, bodily fluids, tentacles & masturbation.
